website_summaries.verdict: A little more expensive, but this sifter comes with lids to keep the flour in the sifter and allow you to use it for storage.
pros: Gets rid of the flour lumps and helps make your cakes lighter and fluffier
Lid will keep flour from flying all over the kitchen
Also has a bottom cover to allow you to use the sifter for storage in the pantry
cons: The lids do not always fit very tightly on this sifter

customer_reviews.title: the lids are USELESS
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to figure out how this sifter got so many great reviews! The lids were the selling point and they do not even fit the sifter. Yes, you can sit the sifter on a lid, but sitting it on a paper plate would be as effective.... because when you pick up the sifter, the "lid" stays on the counter. Poor design and not worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Karnie B

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!! Don't get this one!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this sifter often but after the last use, I noticed some rust on the inside basket. This is supposed to be stainless steel! I went by the reviews and think this was a good product. Not any more. Now, i have to spend more mmoney to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Natizo  3 cup sifter works!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a little difficult to use since it has the crank instead of a squeeze handle, but it's not ! It's a nice size with marking on the outside and lines on the inside! Liked the lids for the top and bottom ! Wish the lids were a little more snug fitting, but they certainly were easy to remove as I used the sifter!
customer_reviews.author: Anne F. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: If the sifter is filled over the 1 1/2 cup line, it will leak out the side holes! It is designed poorly, and is very clunky to use.
customer_reviews.author: LISA DAY

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Stainless Steel Sifter!
customer_reviews.text: Very reminiscent of my grandmother's old sifter. Hard to find quality cookware at this price anymore. Very happy with it so far. Helps my biscuits come out super fluffy by sifting the flour, baking powder, and salt together before adding the remaining ingredients. Snap on dual lids keep my cabinet clean. Many thanks for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed - flour leaks from where the cranker is attached.
customer_reviews.author: sukilalala

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this sifter!
customer_reviews.text: This sifter is amazing! I love that it comes with a protective top and bottom to keep the sifter and your cupboards clean. It feels like it’s a quality piece for my baking needs. I only use it a couple of times a year, but I imagine you could use it much more frequently with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Runion

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after all my reading/research
customer_reviews.text: 1 month into light use I am already shopping for a new one. The knob is off and on, the “wheel”? Barely turns against the grate, the only nice thing about it besides the stainless construction is the semi snug plastic caps that I hope will transfer over to my next sifter.
customer_reviews.author: DavidBG

customer_reviews.title: Nice sifter!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sifter. The only reason I took a star away is that the lids are a little loose, so you have to be careful they don't fall off and spill flour all over. The handle system also feels a little unsteady, so I am hoping it lasts. All in all though I am enjoying it and it worked great during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Croston

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Nice sifter.
customer_reviews.text: Well built sifter with the no-mess convenience of having a lid for both the top and bottom. I will say that I am a little disappointed that the lids don't fit tight, therefore they'll fall off. Not a big enough issue to remove a star, however it is somewhat inconvenient having to place a rubber band around the sifter to hold the lids on.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This sifter is exactly like the one my grandmother used and for all the new kinds available, this is by far the best! I have bought several different kinds over the years and have gone by to what I know works. The lids for top and bottom are an added bonus, both for storage and when in use. The sifter came as promised, packaged well and price was good. What is not to love about it???!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Bryant

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not take long to rust. Because of this a hole formed in mesh. So.. disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Not 100%

customer_reviews.title: Love this flour sifter!
customer_reviews.text: This sifter is great. We previously used a battery powered sifter but this hand held is very easy to turn and quickly sift. I think it will last longer than the plastic battery one we used. We just use to sift flour and do not wash. The cover is very helpful. Given the quality I expect we will have this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Patti N RVC

customer_reviews.title: I like the design because there are less moving parts
customer_reviews.text: Lids do not fit too tight so make sure you have a hold of it. I like the design because there are less moving parts. Where the crank handle goes through the housing on both sides there are holes that allow flour to spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made - love the covers
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and I love the plastic cover and bottom. I don't spray the flour out the top and when I want to set it down on the counter I can use the bottom piece so it doesn't lift sifted ingredients on my counter. Also, when I am baking cookies that need a dusting of confectioner's sugar I can store the sugar in it until I need it. Great sifter
customer_reviews.author: debbie700

customer_reviews.title: this one is great. I love the covers for both top & ...
customer_reviews.text: My old sifter is 40+ years old, it was time for a new one, this one is great. I love the covers for both top & bottom. Great Item, great service. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Burger

customer_reviews.title: Still the best sifter.
customer_reviews.text: Con: If you put too much flour in it, more than a cup, it sprays out the holes in the side for quite a distance, making an impressive mess in just seconds. So, the useful capacity is much less than it looks. Pros: It works great, easy to use, doesn't rust. It replaced a fancy plastic one that performed teriibly, got dropped on the floor and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Suhrer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A GREAT SIFTER--- EASY TO USE AND KEEP CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: MAYBE ONLY A FEW PEOPLE STILL HAVE MUCH USE FOR A SIFTER ...I AM A GRANDMOM WHO STILL LOVES TO BAKE...THIS IS A GREAT SIFTER--- EASY TO USE AND KEEP CLEAN....PLASTIC INSERTS TOP AND BOTTOM ARE AN INSPIRED ADDITION AND MAKE IT EVEN EASIER TO MANAGE THE FLOUR DUST WHEN USING THE SIFTER AND TO KEEP IT AS WELL AS THE STORAGE AREA CLEAN BETWEEN USES. FOR YEARS I HAD KEPT MY OLD ONE IN A PLASTIC BAG TO MANAGE MESS. i LOST IT WHEN I MOVED BUT NOW I HAVE FOUND THE PERFECT REPLACEMENT.
customer_reviews.author: History student living in the wrong time period

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is very difficult to use. Flour flies all over, can't get the flour at the end of sifting to go through the screen, flour packs up on the sides
customer_reviews.author: J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Messy To Use
customer_reviews.text: After using this product several times, I find that it's messy and gets flour all over the counter. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Sifts quickly with little mess
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to getting this softer because it was similar to the one I used to have that rusted. I replaced my original with one that had a squeeze trigger and it was horrible , so I decided to go back to the crank style. This one sifts easily and I love the lids for top and bottom. The one drawback is that you can't actually put more than one cup at a time because there are holes where the crank fits, and flour/sugar leaks out a little. It sifts so fast though that I am willing to deal with that minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Eller

customer_reviews.title: I love the sifter
customer_reviews.text: I love the sifter. I had been looking for some time to find one that had the handle that turned, One of the things that is really nice about is that it has the two covers. I have been very impressed with your company. I feel you really are interested in whether or not I like your product. I would certainly recommend your company to anyone. Thank you for the great customer service you provide and the good quality of your products. M. Rich
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Rich

customer_reviews.title: Three cups when sifting flour is not much
customer_reviews.text: Works great but if I had it to do again I would have bought a bigger size but that was my fault
customer_reviews.author: Skipper O’Bannon

customer_reviews.title: It's a good sifter. The lids won't stay on mine though
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sifter. The lids won't stay on mine though. I have to hold the bottom one on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Richards

customer_reviews.title: ... flour even for a little bit is not a good idea!
customer_reviews.text: This works but I feel is made rather cheaply also the lid will not fit properly so trying to store flour even for a little bit is not a good idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great. Love the covers
customer_reviews.text: Great. Love the covers, helps keep the flour in the sifter rather than send it flying every where else. Get one of these and you’ll throw the hand squeeze model into the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Moon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I especially like the bottom and top lids. Keeps the flour in the sifter until I'm ready to use it. Also keeps the flour from flying out the top while sifting. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great sifter - works exactly as described and my flour was beautifully sifted. It recommended to keep the lid on the top while sifting - and that worked great too. I was so glad to find this style of sifter. I had been searching the stores for one.
customer_reviews.author: Knitflicka

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my baking life!?
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! It keeps down the kitchen mess with the lid and less food waste since the flour stays put where it needs to. Can't say enough good things about this product. If you love to bake you absolutely need to buy this. :-)
customer_reviews.author: nmmusic68

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got tired of sifting with a large mesh strainer and getting flour or powdered sugar all over me. I am so happy with this sifter! I love that it has a cover on the top & bottom!!
customer_reviews.author: lioness08332

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and love that it has the covers!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Robison

customer_reviews.title: I Have No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old one that finally fell apart. This one has both a top and bottom cap for storage, so hopefully it will last longer than the 15 years I got out of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Red Celt

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for one of these
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sifter like my Mom had, took a while to find it. I really like the convenience of the bottom and lid. I'd been using a flat-bottom sifter with a sort of trigger mechanism, and it's tough on my arthritis. Now my nostalgia and my hands are both content!
customer_reviews.author: Leslee108

customer_reviews.title: ... the flour sifters I grew up with to be easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is similar enough to the flour sifters I grew up with to be easy to use, while also having those handy covers for the top and bottom. This is a purchase I'm glad I made, especially for use with gluten-free flour and starch combos, where sifting for a smooth batter is so much more important.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... with the spring in the handle and it was horrible. So I went back old school with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought one of the new ones with the spring in the handle and it was horrible. So I went back old school with the handle and shazaam wow sometimes you have to go back into time 1,2,3 done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Reminds me of the one my mama had when I was growing up. Love the fact that it has a top and bottom lid in an attempt to eliminate the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. How genius to have a top and bottom lid so flour doesn't go flying all over the place? It gets flour nice and soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: Baking utensil
customer_reviews.text: Great product, at first hard to find, then all of sudden they started coming out of the woodwork!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Large and has great lids for top and bottom
customer_reviews.text: I use this with baking power inside to dust over my bathtub to clean. It definitely leaks powder, I just keep a towel underneath when I store it. I think the lids would do well with some tape. It's the only one I found with the lid on top and bottom. I wish it had the handle that you just squeeze instead of cranking it. But it's the most useful one I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken McNugget

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel should mean longevity
customer_reviews.text: This sifter works just as expected. I like the lids....helps contain the flour. When I do wash the sifter, I do so after the baking is done and the oven is off, dry it with a dish towel then set it in the cooling oven to ensure it dries completely. I'm encouraged it's stainless steel and should last much longer than the last sifter I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Zippy

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy
customer_reviews.text: This was well thought out. It's a simple design - but works great and the top/bottom lids are very handy. What was really impressive is the customer service. You send an e-mail - you get a prompt reply from a professional, efficient and friendly person.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great sifter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. My old sifter was the squeeze handle type and around 52 years old. Right now using that type is difficult. This is compact and works perfectly plus you get the plastic lids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Like the lids for both ends though
customer_reviews.text: Hard to turn and stuff comes out the holes where the handle turns. Like the lids for both ends though.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: and this Natizo works far better than any I have used in the past
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several flour sifters, and this Natizo works far better than any I have used in the past. The top and bottom covers are helpful while filling and sifting, keeping flour contained. It is as easy to use as it is to clean. Because I do a lot of baking and often doubling recipes, I prefer a larger sifter. If Natizo offers a larger size in the future, I would consider purchasing it. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: AntJ

customer_reviews.title: No more mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to save on mess! Covered for when grandkids stop my baking! No mess in drawer where it's kept! I'm a happy customer! Fast and efficient service!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and like the sifter but the covers will not seal and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and like the sifter but the covers will not seal and that is why I bought this sifter was for the covers to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Love God

customer_reviews.title: Just like my mother's.
customer_reviews.text: My mother had one like this for decades. This one seems to be sturdy enough to last that long. I really like the caps on both ends to keep the flour in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chambless

customer_reviews.title: The snap on lids are a great idea.
customer_reviews.text: What do you say about an ubiquitous kitchen tool, other than it works well. The finish is nice, it looks pretty, and oh yeah, it sifts flour. The snap on lids are a nice touch and do a lot to keep flour from spreading everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Yes!  The Only Type of Flour Sifter I'll Use
customer_reviews.text: This very similar to the one I've been using for 50 years (I inherited it from my mother). It's small, which is nice, and I like the two covers so that I don't get flour rings in my cabinet. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It reminds me so much of the sifter my mother had years ago. It big enough to sift 3 cups of flour without a problem and it comes out fine. I love it. the cranking knob is so nostalgic. I just love it. You won't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It is what I needed, the young people always ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what I needed, the young people always ask "what is that" so I tell and show them, then they say "that is so cool". Something old brought into the new. Thanks..
customer_reviews.author: B. McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Crank out that Dough!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Mesh is the right size. Easy to use. Big capacity. Lids on the top and bottom are a nice touch but, the reason for a star deduction, they don't fit tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Martin H JacobyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Sifting for Pleasure!
customer_reviews.text: A completely satisfactory purchase. The sifter arrived promptly, in fine condition. It is just as advertised, with lids for top and bottom to minimize kitchen messes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Well made and sifts smoothly. Very nice for the price point and will order another for a gift. Nice midrange quality.
customer_reviews.author: MistyDawn

customer_reviews.title: sifter
customer_reviews.text: got this for my sister and she just loves it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Well made sifter--covers are a nice bonus
customer_reviews.text: Sifter seems well made. The rotor assembly has a springiness to it that allows it to stroke against the screen as it turns (as it should). The plastic covers are a nice bonus; they fit just tightly enough IMO. BTW, I'm an old geek and have gone MANY years without sifting. Just figured modern flour didn't need it. And I suppose it doesn't. But ... our muffins turn out light and fluffy now. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: techno_fatman

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it! How nice to have lids to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! How nice to have lids to keep the flour from going everywhere (like with my old sifter). The sifter arrived promptly and was as described in the text. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the lid is a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for confectioner’s sugar to use on french toast instead of syrup. The lid makes it great to store the sugar until next time,
customer_reviews.author: Ms K

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, and doesn't make my hand cramp up like the old "trigger" model I used to have. I love that you can put 3 cups of flour in it too. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Softer works well, but lids are loose fitting. The bottom does not stay in during storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use. Washes up like new. I like the hand crank better than the one you squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be easy to turn and soft your flour and sugars through ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be easy to turn and soft your flour and sugars through However it does not turn well and Flours and sugars do not all get sifted I would not purchase this product again
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Spritz Cookies

customer_reviews.title: New Sifter!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and nice replacement for my 50+ sifter which was rusted. Love the lids for the top and bottom. Great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie R. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little tool for pastry sifting... Very well made and great for arthritic hands... Well designed, beautiful tool. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Mister, This Sifter is Swifter!
customer_reviews.text: "No Need to Sift Through the Competition as This Sifter is the BOM! Highly Recommended for Flour and Clumping Kitty Litter!"
customer_reviews.author: Roger Schlecht

customer_reviews.title: works great - the 1 star deduction is just the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: works great - the 1 star deduction is just the bottom cover doesn't stay on very well when you pick it up off the shelf to use it.
customer_reviews.author: justasking

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my 88 year old mother ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 88 year old mother. Her shifter (similar) had finally taken a toll from many, many years of use. So far, she loves the new one and the covers!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: No Muss, NO MESS
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Something making my life easier. Crank is smooth and lid contains floor while I sift. Top and bottom lids are great for after job.
customer_reviews.author: Methos

customer_reviews.title: I really like the covers for this sifter
customer_reviews.text: I really like the covers for this sifter, makes it nice to not have flour all over the place. Sifts flour into a nice fine powder. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: This sifter is perfect. The covers on the bottom and top are ...
customer_reviews.text: We make many dozen cookies for the holiday season. Consequently, we sift a lot of confectioners sugar for the icing. This sifter is perfect. The covers on the bottom and top are ideal for keeping my work area relatively clean. Sometimes the other ingredients get away form me. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: not great. The handle doesn't turn very fluidly
customer_reviews.text: This product is "ok"....not great. The handle doesn't turn very fluidly...but for what I use it for it's not worth returning. It did arrive promptly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: A great sifter plus it has covers for both ends
customer_reviews.text: A great sifter plus it has covers for both ends. The best
customer_reviews.author: joan tracey

customer_reviews.title: Stores clean, uses messy
customer_reviews.text: Flour comes out of the hole where the handle attaches to the body. Love the dual lids though!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use the caps stop spillage. Sturdy well designed
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Reese

customer_reviews.title: flour flies everywhere lid falls off :(
customer_reviews.text: It works decently, you have to go really slow or the flour flies everywhere. The lid falls off and the handle is not the most easy thing to move.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Flour Sifter
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one my mom used with the exception of the plastic lids.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: First time I've has one with a lid. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: leah kile

customer_reviews.title: Nice sifter
customer_reviews.text: Works great and even though the covers don't fit tightly its still good enough for short term storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Shifter
customer_reviews.text: Works great with alternative flours. And the covers keep it from being too messy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... for a stainless steel sifter and this one is awesome! I love the top and bottom covers
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a stainless steel sifter and this one is awesome! I love the top and bottom covers.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I live love love this sifter! It's so quick and clean
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Sabol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a sifter that works and will hold up. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: I love my flour sifter
customer_reviews.text: I love my flour sifter. For years, I used a 3-layer sifter with a full handle. I now have Rheumatoid Arthritis which made it hard to use. The best part is ease in using and the lids - I love them.
customer_reviews.author: wHm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, would have given it a 5 star if ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, would have given it a 5 star if the plastic bottom cap would fit snuggly. Other than that this is a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great flour sifter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to sift confectioner's sugar for icing. It works great. I love the cap on the bottom and top. I really stops the mess.
customer_reviews.author: A. Celidonia

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it still messy ~ not as messy as my old one though!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting for a product like this for years
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for a product like this for years. Finally s way to contain the flour so it doesn't get all over the counter or shelf. Such a simple solution. Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot to say, other than it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say, other than it seems to do the job it's designed to do. I've only put a couple cups through, but had no major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Noyce

customer_reviews.title: Love my new stainless steel sifter
customer_reviews.text: Love my new stainless steel sifter. It has lids for the top & bottom. I'm looking forward to this sifter lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Mess free
customer_reviews.text: Great sifter and the lids are perfect for keeping the mess to a minimum. I grew up helping my grandma and dad bake cakes and this was the kind of sifter they used. I've always wanted one and I'm glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Twoscreens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is sifting magic - no spills - lovely product (to be fair I don't think it's actual magic)
customer_reviews.author: BatGod

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sifter!
customer_reviews.text: I got his sifter for my daughter but I like it so much I am going to get one for myself. I love that it has a lid!
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: No more tired right arm
customer_reviews.text: The sifter is wonderful. No more using a spoon & scoop net to sift.
customer_reviews.author: Mariko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Updated version of the one my grandmother used. Top and bottom lid are very useful
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Laird

customer_reviews.title: Does not clog up like the ones with a handle that you squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Does not clog up like the ones with a handle that you squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: CapBob

customer_reviews.title: love the plastic top and bottom cover
customer_reviews.text: Impressive quality, love the plastic top and bottom cover, crank handle turns easily.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. i was looking for something even more heavy duty , but this is obviously high quality.
customer_reviews.author: katac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has a top and bottom lid- reduces mess significantly. Very nice sifter!
customer_reviews.author: H.C.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lid for top and bottom
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why two lids When I started baking with it I get it Very smart
customer_reviews.author: Torin

customer_reviews.title: Sifter with top and bottom covers
customer_reviews.text: The cover for top and bottom is great. It makes sifting flour and confectioners sugar much less messy. Why has no one thought of this before?
customer_reviews.author: Majak

product_meta.title: Natizo Stainless Steel 3-Cup Flour Sifter - Lid and Bottom Cover - No More Mess In Your Kitchen
feature_bullets: ✓ IMPRESS YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS WITH CAKES THAT ARE FINER AND LIGHTER THAN EVER BEFORE. Get rid of annoying flour lumps, effectively mix your ingredients and increase the accuracy of your measurements to make irresistible cakes, cookies and pastry that everyone adores.

✓ ELIMINATE FLYING FLOUR IN YOUR KITCHEN AND FLOUR RINGS IN YOUR CUPBOARDS. You have better things to do than clean up flour from every corner of your kitchen (and yourself). That's why we've created a lid to stop flour flying out the top of the sifter when you're using it and a unique bottom cover to keep your cupboards clean during storage.

✓ FAST AND EASY TO USE AND CLEAN. Flour, icing sugar, baking powder, cocoa and your other powdered ingredients quickly pass through the fine mesh with an easy turn of the handle thanks to the classic crank design and the 2 wire agitator. To clean up, simply wipe down the sifter and when it's dry snap on the lids. Makes sifting easier than ever.
✓ BUILT TO LAST. The entire sifter including the hand crank, agitator and mesh are made from resilient, long-lasting, rust-resistant stainless steel.

✓ 100% LIFETIME SATISFACTION WARRANTY. We're sure you'll love your new flour sifter, but if you aren’t happy with it, at any time, simply let us know and we’ll promptly send you a full refund. No hassle and absolutely no risk on your part.
